To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Crash Site
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

After seeing that the shuttles where almost worthless, Motormaster sighed.
"Why do we have to get the useless ones," he mumbled to himself, "Okay
boys, strip some of the metal armor off it, as much as you can, and
somebody grab the blasters, we'll take em back to base, there may be a use
for them" and at that, Motormaster plunged his arms into the steel hull of
the shuttle, and grunted as he tried to tear off a plank of armor.
